arts.ttl: Moreirense come from behind to beat Sporting 2-1 and plunge Lions into crisis
arts.sum: After holding Benfica to a draw and knocking FC Porto out to the Portuguese Cup this season, Moreirense clocked up another impressive performance and result by beating Sporting 2-1 in Moreira de Cónegos. The Lions started well, Victor Gyökeres earning and converting an early penalty. But Moreirense had turned it around by half time thanks to goals by Dinis Pinto and Guilherme Schettine, and the home team could have scored more before the interval. In the second half it was one-way traffic, twice Sporting hitting the bar, but João Pereira’s team failed to carve out clear-cut chances and the new coach is now under intense scrutiny after three successive defeats.

arts.ttl: Man Utd Transfer News Today: Amad PROGRESS, Gyokeres BOOST, QUEUE to sign unwanted star
arts.sum: Manchester United are said to be taking steps towards ensuring Amad Diallo signs a new deal with the club. All the latest Manchester United transfer news, rumours and gossip, with Amad Diallo, Harry Maguire and Viktor Gyokeres making the headlines.

arts.ttl: Man Utd discover Sporting CP's stance over Gyokeres making January transfer
arts.sum: The outlet stated: "A January move for Gyokeres continues to seem unlikely because of the £85million release clause figure that would need to be met for a deal to open up. Man Utd discover Sporting CP's stance over Gyokeres making January transfer

arts.ttl: Man Utd transfer news: Ruben Amorim forced into Viktor Gyokeres rethink as priority becomes clear
arts.sum: Manchester United are set to be busy in the January transfer window as Ruben Amorim looks to bring in players to match the new style he is looking to deploy at Old Trafford

arts.ttl: Amorim told to open Gyokeres transfer talks NOW
arts.sum: Manchester United have been told to start negotiating the signing of Viktor Gyokeres from Sporting CP with an eye to capturing him in the January transfer window. Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim has said that Gyokeres will not leave Sporting until the summer.

arts.ttl: Boniface or Gyokeres? Man United narrow forward focus
arts.sum: Manchester United are continuing to monitor Bayer Leverkusen striker Victor Boniface, though interest in Sporting Lisbon’s Viktor Gyokeres is ‘much more concrete’. Boniface is a player under consideration as Manchester United consider the signing of another centre-forward, as the club seek established support for Rasmus Hojlund and Joshua Zirkzee. The Nigeria international burst onto […] The post Boniface or Gyokeres? Man United narrow forward focus first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Gyokeres 'more concrete' for Man Utd amid Boniface update
arts.sum: Manchester United like Bayer Leverkusen forward Victor Boniface but they have a more 'concrete' interest in Viktor Gyokeres of Sporting CP . Gyokeres 'more concrete' for Man Utd amid Boniface update

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool, Man City in race for Frimpong
arts.sum: Liverpool and Manchester City appear set to compete for the signature of Bayer Leverkusen's Jeremie Frimpong, while Manchester United have identified RB Leipzig's David Raum as a potential solution for manager Ruben Amorim at left-back. - Liverpool have identified Bayer Leverkusen right-back Jeremie Frimpong as their No. 1 potential replacement for Trent Alexander-Arnold, according to TeamTalk .

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool, Man City in race for Frimpong
arts.sum: Liverpool and Manchester City appear set to compete for the signature of Bayer Leverkusen's Jeremie Frimpong, while Manchester United have identified RB Leipzig's David Raum as a potential solution for manager Ruben Amorim at left-back. - Liverpool have identified Bayer Leverkusen right-back Jeremie Frimpong as their No. 1 potential replacement for Trent Alexander-Arnold, according to TeamTalk .
